verses.verse: He brought me back <S%H7725><s%> to the door <S%H6607><s%> of the house; <S%H1004><s%> and behold, <S%H4325><s%> waters issued out <S%H3318><s%> from under the threshold <S%H4670><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> eastward; <S%H6921><s%> (for the forefront <S%H6440><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> was toward the east; <S%H6921><s%>) and the waters <S%H4325><s%> came down <S%H3381><s%> from under, <S%H3233><s%> from the right side <S%H3802><s%> of the house, <S%H1004><s%> on the south <S%H5045><s%> of the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

Then he brought me out <S%H3318><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> northward, <S%H6828><s%> and led me round by the way <S%H1870><s%> outside to the outer <S%H2351><s%> gate, <S%H8179><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> that looks <S%H6437><s%> toward the east; <S%H6921><s%> and behold, <S%H6379><s%> there ran out waters <S%H4325><s%> on the right <S%H3233><s%> side. <S%H3802><s%>

When the man <S%H376><s%> went forth <S%H3318><s%> eastward <S%H6921><s%> with the line <S%H6957><s%> in his hand, <S%H3027><s%> he measured <S%H4058><s%> one thousand <S%H505><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> and he caused me to pass through <S%H5674><s%> the waters, <S%H4325><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> that were to the ankles. <S%H657><s%>

Again he measured <S%H4058><s%> one thousand, <S%H505><s%> and caused me to pass through <S%H5674><s%> the waters, <S%H4325><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> that were to the knees. <S%H1290><s%> Again he measured <S%H4058><s%> one thousand, <S%H505><s%> and caused me to pass through <S%H5674><s%> the waters, <S%H4325><s%> waters that were to the waist. <S%H4975><s%>

Afterward he measured <S%H4058><s%> one thousand; <S%H505><s%> and it was a river <S%H5158><s%> that I could <S%H3201><s%> not pass through; <S%H5674><s%> for the waters <S%H4325><s%> were risen, <S%H1342><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> to swim in, <S%H7813><s%> a river <S%H5158><s%> that could not be passed through. <S%H5674><s%>

He said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H1121><s%> Son of man, <S%H120><s%> have you seen <S%H7200><s%> this? <S%H3212><s%> Then he brought me, <S%H7725><s%> and caused me to return to the bank <S%H8193><s%> of the river. <S%H5158><s%>
Now when I had returned, <S%H7725><s%> behold, <S%H8193><s%> on the bank of the river <S%H5158><s%> were very <S%H3966><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> trees on the one side and on the other. <S%H6086><s%>

Then he said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H4325><s%> These waters issue forth <S%H3318><s%> toward the eastern <S%H6930><s%> region, <S%H1552><s%> and shall go <S%H935><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> into the Arabah; <S%H6160><s%> and they shall go toward the sea; <S%H3220><s%> into the sea <S%H3220><s%> shall the waters go which were made to issue forth; <S%H3318><s%> and the waters <S%H4325><s%> shall be healed. <S%H7495><s%>

It shall happen, <S%H5315><s%> that every living creature which swarms, <S%H2416><s%> in every place <S%H8317><s%> where the rivers <S%H5158><s%> come, <S%H935><s%> shall live; <S%H2421><s%> and there shall be a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H7227><s%> multitude of fish; <S%H1710><s%> for these waters <S%H4325><s%> have come <S%H935><s%> there, <S%H7495><s%> and the waters of the sea shall be healed, and everything shall live <S%H2425><s%> wherever the river <S%H5158><s%> comes. <S%H935><s%>

It shall happen, <S%H1728><s%> that fishermen shall stand <S%H5975><s%> by it: <S%H5872><s%> from En Gedi even to En Eglaim <S%H5882><s%> shall be a place for the spreading <S%H4894><s%> of nets; <S%H2764><s%> their fish <S%H1710><s%> shall be after their kinds, <S%H4327><s%> as the fish <S%H1710><s%> of the great <S%H1419><s%> sea, <S%H3220><s%> exceeding <S%H3966><s%> many. <S%H7227><s%>
But the miry places <S%H1207><s%> of it, <S%H1360><s%> and its marshes, shall not be healed; <S%H7495><s%> they shall be given <S%H5414><s%> up to salt. <S%H4417><s%>

By the river <S%H5158><s%> on its bank, <S%H8193><s%> on this side and on that side, <S%H5927><s%> shall grow every tree <S%H6086><s%> for food, <S%H3978><s%> whose leaf <S%H5929><s%> shall not wither, <S%H5034><s%> neither shall its fruit <S%H6529><s%> fail: <S%H8552><s%> it shall bring forth new fruit <S%H1069><s%> every month, <S%H2320><s%> because its waters <S%H4325><s%> issue out <S%H3318><s%> of the sanctuary; <S%H4720><s%> and its fruit <S%H6529><s%> shall be for food, <S%H3978><s%> and its leaf <S%H5929><s%> for healing. <S%H8644><s%>

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H136><s%> This <S%H1454><s%> shall be the border, <S%H1366><s%> by which you shall divide the land <S%H776><s%> for inheritance <S%H5157><s%> according to the twelve <S%H8147><s%> tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> shall have two portions. <S%H2256><s%>

You shall inherit <S%H5157><s%> it, <S%H376><s%> one as well as another; <S%H251><s%> for I <S%H5375><s%> swore <S%H3027><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> it to your fathers: <S%H1><s%> and this land <S%H776><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> to you for inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>

This shall be the border <S%H1366><s%> of the land: <S%H776><s%> On the north <S%H6828><s%> side, <S%H6285><s%> from the great <S%H1419><s%> sea, <S%H3220><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of Hethlon, <S%H2855><s%> to the entrance <S%H935><s%> of Zedad; <S%H6657><s%>

Hamath, <S%H2574><s%> Berothah, <S%H1268><s%> Sibraim, <S%H5453><s%> which is between the border <S%H1366><s%> of Damascus <S%H1834><s%> and the border <S%H1366><s%> of Hamath; <S%H2574><s%> Hazer Hatticon, <S%H2694><s%> which is by the border <S%H1366><s%> of Hauran. <S%H2362><s%>

The border <S%H1366><s%> from the sea, <S%H3220><s%> shall be Hazar Enon <S%H2703><s%> at the border <S%H1366><s%> of Damascus; <S%H1834><s%> and on the north <S%H6828><s%> northward <S%H6828><s%> is the border <S%H1366><s%> of Hamath. <S%H2574><s%> This is the north <S%H6828><s%> side. <S%H6285><s%>

The east <S%H6921><s%> side, <S%H6285><s%> between <S%H996><s%> Hauran <S%H2362><s%> and <S%H996><s%> Damascus <S%H1834><s%> and <S%H996><s%> Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> shall be the Jordan; <S%H3383><s%> from <S%H996><s%> the north border <S%H1366><s%> to the east <S%H6931><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> you shall measure. <S%H4058><s%> This is the east <S%H6921><s%> side. <S%H6285><s%>

The south <S%H5045><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> southward <S%H8486><s%> shall be from Tamar <S%H8559><s%> as far as the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Meriboth <S%H4808><s%> Kadesh, <S%H6946><s%> to the brook <S%H5158><s%> of Egypt, <S%H1419><s%> to the great sea. <S%H3220><s%> This is the south <S%H8486><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> southward. <S%H5045><s%>

The west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> shall be the great <S%H1419><s%> sea, <S%H3220><s%> from the south border <S%H1366><s%> as far as <S%H935><s%> over against <S%H5227><s%> the entrance of Hamath. <S%H2574><s%> This is the west <S%H3220><s%> side. <S%H6285><s%>
So you shall divide <S%H2505><s%> this land <S%H776><s%> to you according to the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

It shall happen, <S%H5307><s%> that you shall divide it by lot for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to you and to the aliens <S%H1616><s%> who live <S%H1481><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you, <S%H3205><s%> who shall father children <S%H1121><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you; <S%H249><s%> and they shall be to you as the native - born <S%H249><s%> among the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> they shall have <S%H5307><s%> inheritance <S%H5159><s%> with you among <S%H8432><s%> the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

It shall happen, <S%H7626><s%> that in what tribe the stranger <S%H1616><s%> lives, <S%H1481><s%> there you shall give <S%H5414><s%> him his inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3069><s%>
